title: U.S. teens : most frequently accessed social networks 2019
yAxis: Share of respondents who use network most often
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents who use network most often for 9 number of Platforms.
The maximum Share of respondents who use network most often 25.0 is found at Platform Instagram and the minimum is found at Other where Platform is 1.0.
The maximum Platform Instagram has got 25.0 times higher Share of respondents who use network most often than the minimum Platform Other.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents who use network most often for 9 number of Platforms.
The Share of respondents who use network most often is highest at Platform Instagram and lowest at Platform Other.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents who use network most often for 9 number of Platforms.
The maximum Share of respondents who use network most often 25.0 is found at Platform Instagram and the minimum is found at Other where Platform is 1.0.
The maximum Platform Instagram has got 25.0 times higher Share of respondents who use network most often than the minimum Platform Other.
max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents who use network most often in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents who use network most often is appeared to be the highest at Platform Instagram and lowest at Platform Other.
Platform Facebook has the second highest value for Share of respondents who use network most often.
The highest Platform Instagram has 24.0 more Share of respondents who use network most often than the lowest Platform Other.
Share of respondents who use network most often at Platform Instagram is 25.0 , second place is Facebook at 24.0, and thirdly is Snapchat at 22.0.
Platform Other, and Don't know have a similar Share of respondents who use network most often that is 1.0.
The Platform Other has 2.25 times less Share of respondents who use network most often than average.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 100.0.
